MS MCQs

    Set up job posting groups in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. How many job posting groups can you set up in Business Central?

      You can set up one job posting group.

      You must set up a job posting group for each WIP method that you want to use.

      You can set up as many posting groups as you need, but at least three; one for handling resources, one for handling items, and one for handling G/L accounts.

      You can set up as many posting groups as you need.


    2. Where can you assign the default job posting group?

      On the General Ledger Setup page.

      On the Jobs Setup page.

      On the Job Posting Group page by selecting Default for the job posting group that you want to use as the default.

      On the Job Posting Setup page.
